name: Chari - A nepali game
description:
I am a student from a south east asian country called  Nepal and this is my first game. Just wanted to immortalize it by submitting it here.  

      'Chari' - directly translated from the Nepali language , means Bird/Birdie. This game follows you, the main character, Chari on your journey as you soar through the sky avoiding the buildings. But you soon realize the gap between the buildings get narrower with time. Since the gaps get to a point where even your tiny body cannot fit through, you start to panic and as you hit a building and vanish from existence, you realize you never had any goals to achieve and were flying endlessly. So Yeah, basically a FlappyBird clone. It's my first game,  what did you expect?  

     Enjoy and explore the sky as 'Chari'.
